entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Read_Archive_File failing due to access denied to tar/pax/file.tar #68357
  • System.Text.Json incremental source generator performance issues #68353
  • System.TimeOnly: Compact round-trip format #68348
    Future
  • Empty string literals in Marshal.cs #68347
  • Get rid of IHealthChecksBuilder.AddTypeActivatedCheck<T> in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.HealthChecksBuilderAddCheckExtensions #68344
  • Add common test for getting all types in each runtime library implementation assembly #68341
  • Windows: Implement a way to enable color in console even when the output is redirected #68340
  • [API Proposal]: Add ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfZeroLength() #68339
  • Investigate size increase for Android libmonosgen-2.0.so between net6.0 and 7.0 #68330
    7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAny on more than 5 chars #68328
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Convert argument null checks to ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #68326
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Improve default sort algorithm #68325
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.MyVideos) returns empty string in OSX #68323
  • macOS / Mac Catalyst / iOS: CurrentThread.Current[UI]Culture is always the invariant culture #68321
    6.0.x
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68318
    7.0.0
  • Unable to assign values to struct properties #68316
  • [NativeAOT arm64] application using sha1 and sha2 Instruction Sets does nothing and quits #68315
  • CertificateSelection callback is not called when client use Unified framing #68310
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support ref fields in System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder #68309
  • `System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont` cannot switch automatically according to the system and Do some reflections #68335
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\shortenregisteredlocal\\shortenregisteredlocal.cmd #68306
    7.0.0

Closed

  • GetActiveTcpListeners is not implemented on FreeBSD #64416
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #67216
    7.0.0
  • WriteEventCore with DateTime has changed behavior in .Net 6.0 #61563
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support uint for System.Diagnostics.Metrics instruments #68021
    7.0.0
  • Allow lazy-loading of referenced assemblies in Mono AOT #66361
    6.0.x
  • [devloop] Debug build linker errors in tests on Unix #68279
  • Attempting to write schema to writer throws exception #66557
  • segfault in libcoreclr.so`CallDescrWorkerWithHandler #66970
    7.0.0
  • Assembly.GetTypes fails on System.DirectoryServices assembly #68240
  • C++ cli reference .net 5/6 which reference .net standard2+ not working on Windows #68261
  • ConfigurationBuilder add elements to initialized array instead of replacing it #36569
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `HttpResponseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode(HttpStatusCode statusCode)` #67478
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IsPlusAddress property for MailAddress #68296
    7.0.0
  • Pass more info about matching mode to Regex engine #67980
    7.0.0
  • SEGFAULT due to tiered compilation on 32 bit RASPBIAN .net 6.0 Builds #67102
  • How to build a project using locally built ILCompiler? #68257
  • Is the enumeration order of the Stack<T> collection well defined? #68317
  • Unable To Read Locked File In Linux #34126
    Future
  • NetFramework 4.6.1 to 4.8 with System.Net.Http regression #65005
  • System.Text.Json is unable to deserialize FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult #68280

PullRequests

Created

  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
  • Update Android Docker build image #68354
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Remove MarshalUsingAttribute when System.AggressiveAttributeTrimming is on #68350
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, linkable-framework
  • Remove unused libs.packages subset #68345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove SystemNative_GetUnixName() PAL function #68342
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Backport new Tar APIs #68337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Ensure floating-point types write the exponent/significand as little-endian #68331
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Remove DEBUG_ARG_SLOTS #68319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add support for parsing empty user and password as DefaultCredentials #68312
    area-System.Net.Http
  • fixes in transition blowup and removing recursion from RegexNode conversion #68307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Update area-owners.md #68356
    area-Meta
  • Use "..."u8 to simplify some `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` constructions #68334
    area-Meta
  • Disable UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes on Mac #68346
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Delete some dead code #68333
    area-Meta
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Rev TraceEventVersion to 2.0.77 #68167
    test-enhancement, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add System.Formats.Tar assembly to NetCoreAppLibrary.props #68343
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix locking around m_LoaderAllocatorReferences iteration #68336
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable new CA1311 (ToLower/Upper culture) and CA1852 (seal internal/private types) rules #68268
    area-Meta
  • perf: Fix issues caused by a shared `dotnet` in helix correlation payload directory #67792
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Embed an informational built-by string in JIT #68329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use _ASSERTE in runtime tests #68299
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • upgrade docker to get clang9 to prevent coreclr crashes #68311
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect definition of LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD in System.DirectoryServices #68274
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Add missing Android/tvOS optimization for OperatingSystem.IsOSPlatform() #68313
    area-System.Runtime
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Pass more information about execution mode to RegexRunners #68242
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix ILCompiler using wrong ISA for LZCNT #68324
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not reset assigned interval twice #68305
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added `TestEventListener` #68273
  • Add more details to NativeAOT workflow doc #68308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add more diagnostics to LookupProperty (more diagnostics to flaky tests) #68281
    area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-asmdiffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing #68258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, 7.0.0
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Added Fixes for LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests and Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #68303
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68265
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #65785
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • If the user has < 65 cores and passes in an affinitized range for the 0th CPU group, if valid, honor it. #68283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add Windows and Ubuntu perf runs on Ampere hw #68304
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test adds a stray quotation mark to the -property:VSTestResultsDirectory property in 7.0.100-preview2 #24999
  • Scheme for UrlAttribute #24991
  • Make UrlAttribute work with the Uri data type #24990
  • Native Aot test should work on Linux #24983
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • CLI restore certificate errors from private feed #12637
    Discussion
  • dotnet restore appears to hang on slow connections #14813
  • Add test coverage for `dotnet add package` command #15164
    Backlog
  • Dotnet add package error: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path1') #15544
    Discussion
  • dot add command seems to be ignoring the --source parameter #15665
    Backlog
  • 100ms Regression in Dotnet Build of Console Hello World #16217
  • Unlisted package is suggested for `list package --vulnerable` #16260
  • `dotnet list package --vulnerable` crashes #16279
  • Export output of dotnet list package to a consumable file #16374
  • Query on dotnet restore command using encrypted password #16413
  • Packed .editorconfig as content file does not get buildaction=none #16438
  • Why is <NoDefaultExcludes>true</NoDefaultExcludes> needed when explicitly specifying Pack="true" and PackagePath="..." #16439
    Backlog
  • Make "dotnet list package" also list packages referenced as MSBuild project SDKs #16523
    Backlog
  • dotnet nuget remove source fails when the package source is called 'nuget' #16536
  • dotnet pack, nuspec, file mask only works with backslashes #16816
    Discussion
  • Set proper exit code on `dotnet list package --vulnerable` to enable usage in CI pipelines #16852
  • [Area-CLI] dotnet add package with no version put version="*" #17031
  • dotnet nuget delete fails for non-english local (german) #17471
  • [dotnet sdk 6.0 - preview 4] dotnet pack --no-dependencies isn't supported anymore? #17915
  • Double prompted on first restore of project making use of SDK nuget packages #18037
  • `dotnet build -v diag` does not provide enough diagnostics about Nuget restore #18048
    Discussion
  • npm exitec code1 error #18085
    Discussion
  • [Feature] Ignore failed sources by default when installing new tool #18402
    Backlog
  • dotnet restore ignores Nuget.config and --packages flag for restoring custom SDK reference #18692
  • dotnet restore within Docker image fails with Connection reset by peer errors #19633
  • `dotnet list package` fails when current directory path contains `#` character #19654
  • dotnet pack fails to create .snupkg symbols package when <PackageReadmeFile> is set #20371
  • apt-get update should not fill / with nuget packages #21697
  • Failure in `dotnet add package` prints weird help message #21770
  • dotnet new ignores global.json file #21897
  • Restore log message "所有项目均是最新的，无法还原" should change to "所有项目均是最新的，无需还原" #22131
  • Add support for `dotnet add package [package] --prerelease` #22206
  • Dependencies are not getting downloaded by dotnet restore command #22240
  • Nuget package with multiple content tfm:s doesn't work with package reference #22280
  • dotnet add package should support centrally managed packages. #22356
  • [Feature Request] Nuget package links in `dotnet list package --outdated` #22366
  • Case sensitive filenames for nuget readme needs to be documented. #22397
  • dotnet restore: support RestoreConfigFile from csproj or Directory.Build.props #22517
  • Warn when using deprecated Nuget packages #22635
  • dotnet add: 'Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path1')' error when package name conflicts with existing project reference #22815
  • .NET Core 3.1 ambiguous call when extending an interface from a nuget package #22836
  • NuGet.Config file location #22845
  • error NU1604: Project dependency Microsoft.Azure.Kus to.Cloud.Platform does not contain an inclusive lower bound. Include a lower bound in the dependency version to ensure consistent restore results. #22867
  • Embedded version of NuGet client does not respect "no_proxy" configuration #22942
  • FrameworkReference silently overrides NuGet resolved package versions and ignores dependency constraints. #22986
  • Retrieving packages which is not compatible with the target framework using dotnet list package command #23088
  • Packing project with multiple frameworks skip content files #23127
  • `dotnet` command has been removed from openSuse Leap 15.3 `dotnet-host` package #23304
  • Strange fallback RIDs #23390
  • dotnet restore with .net 6 SDK Build 101 Hangs for 5 minutes then exits with code 1. #23461
  • Trying to get the packages for MAUI with MSVS 2022 preview did not download #23921
  • Restore lock file should not be included in publish output #24007
  • dotnet nuget add source authentication option #24013
  • I can't run the project because of the dotnet throw an error that wasn't my code #24032
  • `dotnet publish` ignores CPVM overrides for specific TFM #24033
  • dotnet publish编译时间太长 #24057
  • Make dotnet list package work without restore when using lock files #24194
  • Add --force-english-output switch to dotnet list package #24356
    Backlog
  • When publishing the nuget dll is not updated if the nuget version is downgraded #24595
  • Using Central Package Management with SDK 6.0.4 #24861
  • SDK 6.0.202 - Detected package downgrade during dotnet restore #24931
  • NetFramework 4.6.1 to 4.8 with System.Net.Http regression #23842
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Support PublicKey metadata on InternalsVisibleTo #25000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new propertygroup #24996
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979

Merged

  • Update the wasm install to skip manifest updates #24958
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a fabricbot.json file to auto close issues with "Area-NuGet" label #24589
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow file changes from tar as it's just a warning #24971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update exception message #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Support multiple runtime packs per FrameworkReference #24873
  • Move `PackageOutputPath` initialization to NuGet's Pack targets #10733
    Document for breaking changes
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • u8 literals should support literal concatenation #60896
  • Inheritance margin crashing when multiple symbols are on the same line. #60894
  • Disable live code analysis #60892
  • For loop auto completion, why not make settings to customize it's behavior? #60891
  • Show entire string in constant string interpolation tooltip #60890
  • Add a command to expand the C# property { get; set; } #60889
  • Inconsistency around accessibility checks for interface implementations #60885
  • SyntaxTree generated XML document comments attribute params source text incorrect #60884
  • Stack Trace Explorer Should Open Reference Assemblies #60883
  • Suggest type parameter constraints, including "generic math" interfaces #60878
  • Incorrect intellisense message for non constant case in a switch #60876
    Backlog
  • IDE0058 is not executed if the method contains #if #60875
  • Update refereneces to release version for 17.2 rtw #60873
    17.2

Closed

  • Yet another spurious warning from NRTs #60880
  • New Inline Rename text is hard to read in blue theme #60734
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify conversion kinds in native int conversion tests #60895
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Respect test requests to expedite processing in solution crawler. #60886
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #60881
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update simplify-type-names to understand global imports. #60872
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • [semi-auto-props]: Remove an already-fixed prototype #60809
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix infinite loop introduced with https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/60227 #60852
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix shift binding for preview on new rename UI #60887
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60877
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused method `Binder.CheckViability<TSymbol>()` #60865
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix typo in Stack Trace Explorer text #60853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove deprecated NuPkg projects #60839
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Cleanup global notification code more. #60866
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Cleanup brace completion code. #60854
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the color key for rename hint text at the bottom #60847
    Area-IDE, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60897
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UnauthorizedAccessException when building .net core 6.0 project on MacOS #41307
  • Http.Sys request body does not support 0-byte reads #41305
  • AddApiAuthorization for IdentityServer should allow to override in memory signing credential store. #41303
  • Blazor Wasm benchmarks not working #41302
  • Visual studio 2022 17.2 preview1 excessive exception logging #41301
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.4.22218.29] grpc-dotnet-2.40.0 Functional Test failed with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException #41297
  • Blazor Server events generate a lots of network traffic in Edge DevTools #41294
  • Blazor Server - many comments rendered in html output #41293
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #41292
  • 2.1.x releases lack commit information #41290

Closed

  • LLVM Error When publishing blazor wasm #41192
  • When publishing a web application in library mode, it does not copy the contents of _content #41278
  • PassThroughAuthorizationHandler does not respect AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure #41043
    7.0-preview5
  • #40786 reopened: Blazor InputNumber and InputDate components fail to compile on .NET 7 Preview 3 #41296
  • Suggested workaround for lack of Blazor WASM log scopes #41300
  • Blazor WebAssembly: conflict between parameters and event callback prevents rendering #41282
  • Why is this issue still not planned to fix, it is almost mid of 2022? What heck is stopping it to do? If not then what is alternate to support ssrs reports in .net core 3, 5 or 6? #41298
  • dotnet publish --no-build on ubuntu fails with error: Manifest file at '/someFolder/staticwebassets.build.json' not found. #41149

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor Wasm benchmarks #41312
    area-blazor
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41310
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove quotes from MultipartReader boundary #41308
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Unqurantine "Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess" #41304
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Zero byte reads support for FileBufferingReadStream #41287 #41309
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-preview5
  • Make PassThroughHandler respect InvokeHandlers flag #41289
    area-security, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Document the EventPipeFormat in this repository #804
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Clarify contribution guidelines #792
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnostics repo docs update #1673
    .NET 7.0
  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create EventPipeFormat.md #3024

Updated

  • Update tool to account for missing symbol #3021
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Toolbar overlaps with Android notification bar #6392
  • Picker width on Windows not filling container #6391
    6.0.300
  • Make Shell compatible with the other page types in .NET MAUI #6389
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Negative Padding values fail #6387
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CollectionView on Android does not show new objects if it starts with 0 objects #6386
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout has no height in ListView #6380
    6.0.300
  • Image AspectFill not working #6378
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ListView ItemsSource refreshing problems in Windows and Android, Button double activating before DisplayAlert popup #6377
    6.0.300
  • BorderColor does not work on visualStateManager #6370
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - Shell - Bottom tabs do not work in Windows and the icon is not displayed #6369
    .NET 7
  • Text bounces while invalidating the Drawable #6368
    6.0.300-servicing

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an analyzer for new objects in OnConfiguring that are used as part of the ServiceProvider key #27856
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 6.0.4 #27855
  • Can't create a view with navigation property #27854
    6.0.x
  • TimeFromParts not working #27853
  • Use client value comparer as provider value comparer if possible #27850

Closed

  • GroupJoin clause is not working - EFCore throw an exception #27858
  • Allow using retry policies on explicit transactions using savepoints? #27716
  • Cycle navigation #27851
  • How do you configure a one-to-one/many relationship for future entities? #27821

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.x] Return null constraint names for keys and FKs on entity types not mapped to a table. #27857
    Servicing-consider
  • [6.0.x] Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27852
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6

Merged

  • Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27845

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
  • Reduce SaveChanges roundtrips #27713
